meaningMnemonic: If you take the <kanji>road</kanji> of the <kanji>military</kanji> you're going to have to fight a lot. Back in the day, this involved learning <vocabulary>martial arts</vocabulary> to fight with. Remember, just wax off.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
